nodes.text: ID-75 Heavy Assault Droid was a droid model in use during the Galactic War. White Maw pirate captain Ayor-v9 used several ID-75 Heavy Assault Droids for protection of his base in the tunnels of Hoth and considered them to be "his family".
ID-75 Heavy Assault Droids appear in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Bounty Hunter class mission on Hoth.
